医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员找到了一种微创方法来测量患者的颅内压约翰·霍普金斯大学医学研究人员发表了一项新研究，报告了一种潜在的替代性且侵入性较小的方法来测量患者的颅内压 (ICP)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Researchers-identify-a-less-having-approach-to-measure-intraranial-Pressure-in-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Researchers-identify-a-less-having-approach-to-measure-intraranial-Pressure-in-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8db29703-d00a-4075-84cf-eb7e282fb4cf Tue, 23 Jul 2024 22:29:11 -0400 Researchers identify a less-invasive approach to measure intracranial pressure in patients
研究验证了斯德哥尔摩3测试对种族混合人群中前列腺癌的影响Stockholm3 是瑞典开发的一种前列腺癌测试，通过算法对血液样本中的蛋白质和遗传标记进行组合，以找出患者患有具有临床意义的癌症的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Study-validates-Stockholm3-test-for-prostate-cancer-in-ethnically-mixed-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Study-validates-Stockholm3-test-for-prostate-cancer-in-ethnically-mixed-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2ada762-953a-4387-b6b3-7f16fc8936fd Tue, 23 Jul 2024 22:24:56 -0400 Study validates Stockholm3 test for prostate cancer in ethnically mixed populations
研究人员开发出准确快速的遗传性疾病诊断方法尽管近几十年来基因检测取得了快速进展，但全世界有一半以上疑似患有孟德尔遗传病的人没有得到准确的分子诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Researchers-develop-accurate-and-rapid-method-for-diagnosing-genic-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Researchers-develop-accurate-and-rapid-method-for-diagnosing-genic-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58442918-3714-45d5-b837-0b44ce5c6cd3 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 22:20:31 -0400 Researchers develop accurate and rapid method for diagnosing genetic disorders
加州大学旧金山分校的研究显示，微型移动车辆造成的伤害和住院人数增加了一倍加州大学旧金山分校的国家研究发现，流行的微型移动车辆造成的伤害和住院人数增加了一倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/UCSF-study-reveals-doubling-of-injuries-and-hospitalizations-from-micromobility-vehicles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/UCSF-study-reveals-doubling-of-injuries-and-hospitalizations-from-micromobility-vehicles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7dfbc932-7023-425a-b567-9603deda9444 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 22:15:18 -0400 UCSF study reveals doubling of injuries and hospitalizations from micromobility vehicles
新研究质疑 CAB-LA PrEP 的 HIV 病毒载量测试的可靠性在一项多国研究中，为人们提供长效可注射卡博特韦 (CAB-LA) HIV 暴露前预防 (PrEP) 的美国临床医生使用的基于实验室的 HIV 病毒载量测试并不能可靠地检测出 HIV。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Reliability-of-HIV-viral-load-tests-for-CAB-LA-PrEP-questioned-in-new-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Reliability-of-HIV-viral-load-tests-for-CAB-LA-PrEP-questioned-in-new-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa74ebca-a5cd-4b9f-8c2b-439093deb5aa Tue, 23 Jul 2024 22:09:39 -0400 Reliability of HIV viral load tests for CAB-LA PrEP questioned in new study
睡前屏幕使用如何影响青少年早期的睡眠《青少年健康杂志》上的一项研究将青少年早期的睡前屏幕使用与睡眠时间缩短和一年后睡眠障碍增加联系起来，强调了减少睡前屏幕时间的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/How-bedtime-screen-use-affects-sleep-in-early-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/How-bedtime-screen-use-affects-sleep-in-early-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=feb6a2f7-b9d6-46dc-b90a-67b65156ba29 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 21:56:00 -0400 How bedtime screen use affects sleep in early adolescents
在一次性电子烟的推动下，英国成年人长期吸电子烟的人数激增《英国医学杂志》的一项研究显示，从 2013 年到 2023 年，英国成年人长期吸电子烟的人数显着增加，特别是随着一次性设备使用的增加。这种激增在年轻人、非吸烟者和社会地位较低的人群中尤为明显。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Long-term-vaping-soars-among-adults-in-England-fueled-by-disposable-e-香烟.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Long-term-vaping-soars-among-adults-in-England-fueled-by-disposable-e-香烟.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=766912b0-9e23-46b7-a56e-cfad6779af9b Tue, 23 Jul 2024 21:47:00 -0400 Long-term vaping soars among adults in England, fueled by disposable e-cigarettes
GeneMAP：用于绘制代谢基因功能的新 tTool我们对细胞代谢的了解存在明显的差距：在许多情况下，我们仍然不知道营养物质是如何输送到细胞中的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/GeneMAP-A-new-tTool-for-mapping-metabolic-gene-functions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/GeneMAP-A-new-tTool-for-mapping-metabolic-gene-functions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f603e249-a21d-408e-b264-0fb5eba11af7 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 21:44:20 -0400 GeneMAP: A new tTool for mapping metabolic gene functions
科学家报告说，SARS-CoV-2 感染的肺细胞类型比之前想象的要多加州大学圣地亚哥分校桑福德伯纳姆普雷比斯分校的科学家及其国际合作者报告说，可能被 SARS-CoV-2 感染的肺细胞类型比之前想象的要多，包括那些没有已知病毒受体的细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/More-types-of-lung-cells-can-be-infected-by-SARS-CoV-2-than-previously-thought-scientists-report。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/More-types-of-lung-cells-can-be-infected-by-SARS-CoV-2-than-previously-thought-scientists-report。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40cf0774-750a-4121-8d24-4949dc0b4a53 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 21:38:54 -0400 More types of lung cells can be infected by SARS-CoV-2 than previously thought, scientists report
研究发现阿巴卡韦与艾滋病毒患者心血管风险增加有关CJ Fichtenbaum 等人。 REPRIEVE 试验中阿巴卡韦与心血管事件风险升高相关。国际艾滋病会议。 2024 年 7 月 26 日星期五https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Abacavir-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-risk-in-HIV-患者-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Abacavir-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-risk-in-HIV-患者-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=643ee8b6-00d7-4eff-aee1-887bca2e52b3 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 21:24:23 -0400 Abacavir linked to increased cardiovascular risk in HIV patients, study finds
